OrgName: Lexalytics, Inc., and its wholly owned subsidiary Semantria, LLC
activities: Lexalytics serves as a data processor to several data controllers located in the EU/EEA. Specifically, Lexalytics provides text and sentiment analysis of unstructured data which may include personal information controlled by customers. All unstructured data provided by customers, which may potentially include personal information, is submitted by our customers, analyzed by Lexalytics given back to our customers, and then purged from Lexalytics’ systems.
contacttitle1: Counsel / Director of HR and Admin
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Lexalytics provides text and sentiment analysis processing of unstructured data which may include personal data, which may have been manually processed, controlled by customers/clients.
